message.content:
{
  "id": "115960",
  "title": "Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item",
  "description": "",
  "OB": "When inserting a text item, data item, and dynamic text item, the datetime values retrieved from a table should be displayed in the same format across all three items.",
  "EB": "After inputting 'new Date()' as the content for all three items, saving, and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the datetime values in the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text items display the datetime values in the same format, while the dynamic text item shows them in a different format.",
  "SR": "To replicate this issue, follow these steps:\n\n1. Insert a text item, data item, and dynamic text item.\n2. Input 'new Date()' as the content for all three items.\n3. Save and preview the form.\n\nThe dynamic text item should display the datetime values in the same format as the data and text items."
}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'SR': 'Insert a text, data, dynamic text item2. '}
